properties.body:
1. DUE TO SPACE WEATHER, HF COMMUNICATIONS
   AND GNSS POSITIONAL INFORMATION MAY BE
   DISRUPTED BY THE EFFECTS OF SOLAR FLARES
   24 THRU 26 MAR.
2. DURING INCIDENTS AT SEA, MARINERS SHOULD
   CHECK THEIR POSITION USING ALL ALTERNATE
   MEANS AVAILABLE.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 270001Z MAR 24.
